title: November
alt: November marks the birthday of Charles Schulz, pioneer of tongue awareness.
transcript:
[Black Hat and Cueball sit in a room.]
Black Hat: Did you know November is Tongue Awareness Month?[Cueball is suddenly aware of his tongue.][Cueball continues to be aware of his tongue.][Cueball is *still* aware of his tongue.]
Cueball: I hate you.
Black Hat: Enjoy the next four weeks.
